segments.text: I notice the open window first, with the garden looking so inviting outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, the sink is pouring water everywhere unexpectedly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but she hasn't seen the overflow yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron are getting splashed, and she's oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the boy on the stool reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting back, which caught me off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is below, arm up, looking so expectant and cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing a secret moment, grabbing those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is widening, surprising how fast it grew.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open, framing the boy's climb perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such mischief in such a normal kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's thrilling to watch, but the dangers are real.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight makes it all feel warm despite the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
